title: tsolomon
author: tsolomon
created_time: July 03, 2022, 01:59:08 PMLast edit: July 03, 2022, 02:12:49 PM by tsolomon
content: Good afternoon,Please tell me a verified service where I can change BTC or other cryptocurrency to Indian rupees. I need a local bank transfer, at the moment I need to send 13000 INR to my friend. In the future, more.Is there anyone here verified from India?Thanks

comments.author: tsolomon
comments.body: P2P exchanges are banned for my country at wazirx

comments.author: henmark
comments.body: I have been looking for P2P in person exchange (my topic on this) but now decided for accepting bank transfers (both UPI and IMPS/NEFT).Please PM your telegram ID. I am ready to go through escrow.
